IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO OPERATE A LOW-INCOME RENTAL HOUSING PROJECT LOCATED IN THE BOROUGH OF MANHATTAN, NEW YORK.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO OPERATE A 123-UNIT LOW-INCOME RENTAL HOUSING PROJECT LOCATED IN THE BOROUGH OF MANHATTAN, NEW YORK.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION OWNS AND OPERATES A 123 UNIT HOUSING FACILITY FOR LOW INCOME ADULTS AND ADULTS WITH PSYCHIATRIC DISABILITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UNDER ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION (ASC) 740, INCOME TAXES, AN ORGANIZATION MUST RECOGNIZE THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT EFFECTS OF A TAX POSITION TAKEN FOR TAX RETURN PURPOSES WHEN IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE POSITION WILL NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION. GC HDFC DOES NOT BELIEVE THERE ARE ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND, ACCORDINGLY, IT WILL NOT RECOGNIZE THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT EFFECTS FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX POSITIONS. GC HDFC HAS FILED FOR AND RECEIVED INCOME TAX EXEMPTIONS IN THE JURISDICTIONS WHERE IT IS REQUIRED TO DO SO.

COMMUNITY ACCESS, INC., AN AFFILIATE OF THE REPORTING ORGANIZATION, PAID COMPENSATION TO THE REPORTING ORGANIZATION'S TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL. COMMUNITY ACCESS, INC. HAS ESTABLISHED THE COMPENSATION OF THE TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL USING FORM 990 OF OTHER ORGANIZATIONS, COMPENSATION SURVEY OR STUDY AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OR COMPENSATION COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PRESENTED AND REVIEWED WITH THE FINANCE COMMITTEE WHO THEN REPORT TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ON ITS CONTENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS ARE ASKED TO SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINES 15A AND 15B:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT COMPENSATE ANY OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
